entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Port-Menier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:23 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Menier 04:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: -5.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.4°C
Wind: SSE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
